thread.title: Summerville Town 2
thread.title_full: Candidates for Summerville Town Council, District 2 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
title: Summerville Town 2
text:
Christine Czarnik Christine Czarnik Age: 51
Residence: Historic District
Occupation: Accountant - Owner of Carolina First Tax & Accounting
Education: Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration from the College of Charleston
 843-871-8750, christine4council@att.net , www.ChristineForCouncil.com
 Restoring an historic cottage that I recently saved from demolition.
 Being an accountant, I understand the need for fiscal responsibility. This is particularly important in the case of town government, where taxpayer money is being managed.
 Restoring transparency to the operation of town government and wisely managing growth in a way that protects our neighborhoods and plans for infrastructure needs ahead of the growth.
Terry Jenkins Age: 70
Residence: Historic downtown
Occupation: VP, Global Sales, Specialty Products, Kapstone Paper
Education: University of South Carolina, BS in business administration
Political experience: Summerville Town Council, 1992-1999 and 2011-2015
Contact information: (843) 200-9096, tjenkins@summervillesc.gov
 golf, fishing, boating, serving on vestry at Christ St. Paul's Church, Yonges Island
 National and international business experience, prior service on council, desire to help Summerville be the best place to live, work and have a business.
 Improve traffic congestion, increase annexation within town borders, increase business development, retain and reduce taxes for homeowners.
